solution_line_template: There were {cookies_left} + {third_friend_took} = <<{cookies_left}+{third_friend_took}={before_third_friend}>>{before_third_friend} cookies left before the third friend took 5.
There were {before_third_friend} + {second_friend_took} = <<{before_third_friend}+{second_friend_took}={before_second_friend}>>{before_second_friend} cookies left before the second friend took 5.
There were {before_second_friend} + {first_friend_took} = <<{before_second_friend}+{first_friend_took}={before_first_friend}>>{before_first_friend} cookies left before the first friend took 3.
There were {before_first_friend} + {brother_took} = <<{before_first_friend}+{brother_took}={before_brother}>>{before_brother} cookies left before Kristy gave 1 cookie to her brother.
There were {before_brother} + {kristy_ate} = <<{before_brother}+{kristy_ate}={total_baked}>>{total_baked} cookies that Kristy baked.
